description: My name is Marc Santisteban Ruiz and I am currently a Fullstack Developer in a consulting firm, providing IT solutions to the hotel chain Meli√°. I work with SpringBoot (Java) in backend and ReactTS (TypeScript) in frontend. I'm passionate about programming and I'm still training in native app development with SwiftUI (iOS) and Jetpack Compose (Android). I have developed a variety of projects and have gained experience in technologies such as Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Google Cloud, among others. I have skills in agile methodologies, SOLID principles, and documentation creation. I am sociable, with leadership and I look for opportunities abroad to grow personally and professionally, as well as to get to know new cultures and receive constructive feedback.
